Introduction
This topic contains information about establishing claims, including
types of claims excluded from establishment in VBMS
preparing for claims establishment
determining the end product (EP) for initial rating-related claims
, and
establishing claims in
VBMS
, and
Share
.
title: M21-1, Part II, Subpart iii, Chapter 3, Section A - Claims Establishment
citation: Part II, Subpart iii, Chapter 3, Section A
